memberdef.name: _XOR_ADMIN_NONETWORKCOMM_DISCLAIMER
memberdef.initializer:
'The current URI is unaccessable on the selected protocol. This could mean you are either missing a required PHP Extension or have a firewall blocking port 80 to the Xortify Cloud.

You can try changing the protocol selected in preferences to see if this may elivate the communication fawl of your hosting services.'

memberdef.name: _XOR_ADMIN_SIGNUP_XORTIFY_P
memberdef.initializer:
'Here you can signup to the XOOPS fortification cloud called Xortify, the main node for this cloud is featured at http://xortify.com but there can be other nodes, this will prevent spam signup, website harvesting, and general hacking of your site.

It will also share the IP\'s of Bad IP Highlighted by Protector with other people running Xortify.'
